value.name: 1 arrested after deputies bust rooster fight in Strathmore
value.description: They later made a traffic stop on another suspect, Ramon Salazar, and found him with four more roosters. They say the 61-year-old also had several sharp steel blades, known as gaffs, which are tied to the animal's legs before fights. He's now in custody.
